title: NA Internet Is Equal To A Third World Countries
body:
I have been in the US for 2 months now, and man what is up with your guy's internet. At first the internet was too slow, getting 3mbps download speed for 70$ a month, now im getting 20 mbps download and 3 mbps upload for 90$ a month. That is crazy expensive for internet that slow.

Not only is it expensive, but the internet shuts off every hour for 6 minutes, costing me a lot of my league games. I dont know how you guys manage with this internet.
